title: Yokohama Kaidashi Kikou
synopsis: After a disaster leaves the world in a state of decline, the remaining human population lives out their lives peacefully and quietly in the twilight of the human age. Alpha Hatsuseno is an android who works at a cafe bordering Yokohama that rarely gets visitors, and is waiting for her owner to return.
related_anime: ['Yokohama Kaidashi Kikou', 'Yokohama Kaidashi Kikou: Quiet Country Cafe']
staff: [['Annou, Takashi', ['Director', ' Episode Director', ' Storyboard']], ['Gontiti', ['Theme Song Composition', ' Music']], ['Ashinano, Hitoshi', ['Original Creator']], ['Katou, Hiroshi', ['Art Director']]]
